name: Team Swap Heroes
description:
To complete these levels requires teamwork - teamwork with yourself!

You have a few seconds to try and collect as many stars as you can, then the level will reset. From here you can now pick a new character to control, and play alongside your previous self to accomplish things you could never do with just one character!

Watch out for the jumping monsters though - there's nothing you can do but run from them!

Controls

Arrow Keys (or WASD) MoveSpacebarPick up / Throw / Use Lever

This is a GameJam entry for Minjam 48, by Joe Shanahan and Amy Elliott.

https://joe-shanahan.itch.io/
https://amy-elliott.itch.io/
